title: Reminiscences
author: Carlyle, Thomas
snippet: She was at Auchtertool too, at Edinburgh with her aunts, once and again; but the chief element was " Sunny Bank, Haddington," which she began with and ended with ; a stay of some leugth each time.

title: Reminiscences
author: Carlyle, Thomas
snippet: Next morning the Ashburtons went for Kinloch-Luichart (fine hunting seat in Koss-shire) ; and my dear little woman to her cousins' at Auchtertool, where I remember she was much soothed by their kindness, and improved considerably^ in health for the time.

title: Reminiscences
author: Carlyle, Thomas
snippet: A very sad record ! We went to Scotland soon after ; she to Auchtertool (cousin Walter's), I to the Gill (sister Mary's).

title: Reminiscences
author: Carlyle, Thomas
snippet: The funeral at Crawfurd I remember sadly well ; old Walter, John, and two sous (Walter of Auchtertool, and Alick now successor  in Liverpool), with various old Moffat people, etc., etc., at the inn at Crawfurd ; pass of Dalveen with Dr. Russell in the dark (holding candles, both of us, inside the chaise), and old Walter's silent sorrow and my own as we sat together in the vacant parlor after getting home.

title: Spare hours /
author: Brown, John
snippet: We drove up from Burntisland, and at Lochgelly he was full of memories of the saintly Seceder minister, Mr. Greig, and pointed out at Auchtertool the fatal meadow now lying in the sun, where Stuart of Dunearn shot Sir Alexander Boswell.
